text: "Champion" is a song by Kanye West from his 2007 album, "Graduation." The track features a motivational theme that celebrates perseverance and success. Sampling "The Champion" by Steely Dan, the production incorporates a blend of electronic elements and hip-hop beats, showcasing Kanye's signature style. The lyrics reflect Kanye's journey to the top, emphasizing hard work and resilience in the face of challenges. The song captures an empowering spirit, encouraging listeners to strive for greatness and embrace their inner champion. Its energetic vibe and impactful message make it a standout track on the album. Category:2007 songs Category:Kanye West songs
title: Champion (Kanye West song)
